name: The Sacrifice of a Delirium Hand
description:
“Which one's more tired? The pierced of working all day long hand, or the eyes with no lids which held by the hand... Either It loses Its mind, or The Mind whom leaves The Hand with those delirium wings, and the red wine from the gold winning goblet is spilled under the sacrifice of The Delirium Hand…”
.
1296x2160 px. Made in 2020 by Toxic Motel for his solo exhibition.
